org.daisy.braille.utils.pef

Class PEFValidator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.daisy.braille.utils.api.factory.AbstractFactory
      • org.daisy.braille.utils.pef.PEFValidator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, org.daisy.braille.utils.api.factory.Factory, org.daisy.braille.utils.api.factory.FactoryProperties, org.daisy.braille.utils.api.validator.Validator

    public class PEFValidator
extends org.daisy.braille.utils.api.factory.AbstractFactory
implements org.daisy.braille.utils.api.validator.Validator
    Validates PEF-documents against the official Relax NG schema. Optionally performs additional checks, see the different modes.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
